nodes.bodyText: Potential overflow in 2 Values before it is converted to long by use in an invocation context.
The variable 'quitetime' is only assigned values of primitive type and is never 'null', but it is declared with the boxed type 'Integer'.
currentVmDiskStats might be null as well.
Just updated the code addressing your comment, @ustcweizhou. Thanks for the heads up 👍
